Headline: 12 Roosevelt Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt,Ashland ,15th,Loomis,and Roosevelt due to,street blockage near Roosevelt/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #12 Roosevelt  buses are temporarily rerouted via  Roosevelt,Ashland ,15th,Loomis and Roosevelt , due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jefferson Park due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jefferson Park due to a mechanical problem on a train

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
